verses.roman:
iṅhāra saṅge āche vipra eka 'bhṛtya'
iṅho pathe karibena sevā-bhikṣā-kṛtya

synonyms: iṅhāra saṅge—with him; āche—is; vipra—brāhmaṇa; eka—one; bhṛtya—servant; iṅho—this man; pathe—on the way; karibena—will do; sevā—service; bhikṣā-kṛtya—and arrangements for cooking.
translation: "In addition, You may take another brāhmaṇa who would act as a servant en route and make arrangements for Your food.
